about_me.title: About Me
about_me.description_2: with almost a year of experience at Plexus Tech. I’m motivated, responsible, and skilled in both front-end and back-end development. I’m looking to join a dynamic team where I can apply my knowledge and keep growing both technically and professionally.
about_me.interesting_1: When I first saw a computer I was 12 years old.
about_me.interesting_2: And I have been curious about technology and video games ever since. So I jumped into this amazing adventure, exploring and discovering everything about them all on my own.

altia.title: Desarrollador Front-End
altia.function_1: Develop and maintain scalable front-end components using React, TypeScript, and JavaScript
altia.function_2: Implement internationalization (i18n) for multilingual support and accessibility
altia.function_3: Write and maintain unit tests using Jest and React Testing Library to ensure code reliability
altia.function_4: Develop responsive interfaces with HTML, CSS, and SASS

plexus.title: Front-End Developer
plexus.function_3: Participate in daily project tracking meetings

freelance.function_1: Develop personal front & back end projects

projects.title: Projects
projects.projects_text: Here are some of my works

p2p.title: P2P - Marketplace
p2p.description: It is a platform for buying and selling second-hand video games, consoles, accessories, and PCs. Users can search for products by name, price, category, and location. By signing up, users gain full access to add and buy products.

weather_app.title: Weather App
weather_app.description: This responsive app provides hourly weather forecasts and five-day predictions. Users can access this information by entering their preferred city name or using their current location.

watchly.title: Watchly
watchly.description: Watchly helps you easily find and enjoy movies and series. Explore popular titles, browse by genres, and watch trailers in a mini player. Fully responsive, so you can enjoy it anytime, anywhere. Made to make watching simple and fun!
